title: Moon Knight Episode 2 Summon The Suit Review
description:
Go to http://chime.com/kfgames to get started with Chime.

Get 25% off and zero delivery fees on their first order of $15 or more, when you download the DoorDash app and enter code KINDAFUNNY.

Go to http://babbel.com/kindafunny to get up to 60% off your subscription.

The boys give their reaction to episode two Summon the Suit of the sixth ever MCU Marvel Studios TV show Moon Knight on Disney Plus starring Oscar Isaac and Ethan Hawke.

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
